bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a disease with something in the abdomen issuing sounds echoing human voices. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lan 藍 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 腹中有物作聲，隨人語言，名應聲蟲 病 , “There is an item in the abdomen that generates sounds echoing human voices. This is called ‘ echo-bug disease ’”. Ying teng 硬疼 , hardening with pain [1]

Illness Sign identical with jian tong 堅痛 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shan yu 鱔魚 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 71: 婦人乳結硬疼痛 , “A nodular hardening with pain in a woman’s breast, “ writes: 婦人乳核硬疼 , “A pit[-like] hardening with pain in a woman’s breast”.
